response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I understand that its worth might be subjective, but I believe it could significantly impact your life positively. I am offering this product to you for $1,200,000. I trust that the value you place on it will align with my asking price. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making an offer. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable piece with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
